title: Shareholding
description: An economic interest in an entity gained by holding shares.

title: Voting rights
description: A controlling interest in an entity gained by holding shares. Defined as the right of shareholders to vote on matters of corporate policy, including decisions on the makeup of the board of directors, issuing securities, initiating corporate actions and making substantial changes in the corporation's operations.

title: Appointment of board
description: A controlling interest in an entity. Defined as the absolute right to appoint members of the board of directors.

title: Other influence or control
description: Any influence or control in an entity that is distinct from being a shareholder, having voting rights or having the absolute right to appoint to the board.

title: Senior managing official
description: A controlling interest in an entity gained by employment. Defined as the person who exercises control over the management of the entity.

title: Settlor
description: A person who, either actually or by operation of law, creates a trust. They may be referred to by other names such as a trustor, a grantor or a donor. This should also be used for a person with a settlor-equivalent role in any legal arrangement that is similar to a trust.

title: Trustee
description: A person who administers a trust for the benefit of a third party and in whom the legal title of the trust property is vested either by declaration of the settlor or by operation of law. This should also be used for a person with a trustee-equivalent role in any legal arrangement that is similar to a trust.

title: Protector
description: A person appointed to protect the interests or wishes of the settlor, providing influence and guidance to the trustee who administers the trust. This should also be used for a person with a protector-equivalent role in any legal arrangement that is similar to a trust.

title: Beneficiary of a legal arrangement
description: A person who benefits from a trust or other legal arrangement's holdings or activities.

title: Rights to surplus assets on dissolution
description: The right to a share in the amount of an asset or resource that exceeds the portion that is utilized upon the winding up of an entity.

title: Rights to receive profits or income
description: An economic interest in an entity. Defined as beneficial ownership rights beyond those otherwise implied by ownership structures that are granted by contract.

title: Rights granted by contract
description: An interest that is granted by contract.

title: Conditional rights granted by contract
description: An interest that exists only if some contractual condition is met.

title: Control via company rules or articles
description: Control of an entity gained through a provision in company articles or by shareholder agreement.

title: Control by legal framework
description: Control of an entity gained through a legal framework, such as a combination of legislation (primary and secondary). This type of interest is created by governments and legislators in order to establish and guide agencies and entities linked to the state.

title: Board member
description: One of a group of people constituted as the strategic decision-making body of an organization.

title: Board chair
description: The person holding the most power and authority on the board of directors.

title: Unknown interest
description: The interestedParty is known to have an interest in the subject of this Relationship Statement, but the nature of the interest is unknown.

title: Unpublished interest
description: The nature of this interest is known but is not published.

title: Enjoyment and use of assets
description: The use of assets belonging to an entity.

title: Right to profit or income from assets
description: The right to derive profits, income or both from assets belonging to an entity.

title: Nominee
description: A person who agrees to act on behalf of the nominator in a specified capacity.

title: Nominator
description: A person who instructs a nominee to act on their behalf in a specified capacity.
